text: Bɨ anɨb ak takaw ogɨnap sek agɨl agak, Pen ensel ne Sadis binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak, takaw agɨnɨgebin ak ensel ak nop kɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. Bɨ God Kawnan ne ak tam pakɨl anep kugul lup ak ayɨp mɨdɨl, gap anep kugul ak dɨ mɨdeb ak, takaw nɨm ak agyokeb agak. Okok tap nɨbi gɨpɨm ak, yad nepin agak. Binɨb okok kɨli agɨlak, Nɨbi Sadis binɨb God yɨl mɨdebɨm okok, koŋɨm mɨdebɨm agɨlak agak. Pen nɨbi pɨsnep kubɨm agak.
